name: Secession Crisis
description: A settlement declares independence from your kingdom

failure.msg: A settlement revolts against your kingdom
manualEffects: Choose or roll for one settlement. That settlement loses one level (minimum level 1)
Reduce the highest tier structure's tier in that settlement by one and mark it as damaged. If the tier is reduced to zero, remove it entirely

criticalFailure.msg: A settlement successfully declares independence from your kingdom
manualEffects: Choose or roll for one settlement. That settlement and all adjacent hexes secede from your kingdom (remove them from your map and mark as independent city-state)
Any armies located in the seceded hexes defect to the new city-state (remove them from your control)
